author: ae5thr0sx
text: Don’t ever explain yourself to others who are not worthy of knowing what’s inside your heart.

author: ae5thr0sx
text:
Tbh I feel like I shouldn’t use any social media at all. Don’t watch any videos, but read islamic books and science books or history books and be attaining knowledge all day long.
Allah oruclarinizi ve dualarinizi kabul etsin !

author: ae5thr0sx
text:
I don’t feel #peace if there is not peace for the whole world. 
I can’t enjoy #food if people have to suffer from #hunger, that resulted e.g. from political interventions by the USA in Afghanistan.
I don’t feel #freedom as long as innocent people are being oppressed.

author: ae5thr0sx
text:
A man without jealousy is not a man. A woman that follows western feminist ways is not a feminist. 
She is just a prey of the dajjalic system and allows the modest muslim man, who is trying to follow the islamic traditions of the prophet, to suffer in this temporary dunya.

author: ae5thr0sx
text:
If we Turks shall ever gain power in this world like in the past times when the Ottoman Empire, that stretched from Anatolia to Europe, to Asia and Africa, held the khilafat.
Then it will be, because we have the allowance from Allah due to correct intentions, morals& character!

author: ae5thr0sx
text: People have become so modern science oriented they forgot the origins of knowledge and science itself.

author: ae5thr0sx
text: It’s Monday but feels like Saturday because I work from Wednesdays to Sundays

author: ae5thr0sx
text:

Eventually such open immoral acts and rumors will normalize cheating in society.
